translation.ko: 우리 삶에 변화가 몇 가지 있을 거야

translation.en: [Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
translation.ko: 난 더 못 낳는 거 알잖아

translation.en: [in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.ko: 허비할 시간이 없으니 다른 아내를 데려왔어

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.ko: 내 허락 없이 그런 결정 내리면 안 되지

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
translation.ko: 아니, 난 당신 허락 필요 없어

translation.en: [in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you
so he could have his entertainment at home.
Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here?
translation.ko: 네가 여기 있는데 왜 다른 데로 눈을 돌려?

translation.en: Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
[in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.ko: 아이를 더 원한대요 우리 둘 다 알다시피 난…

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
[Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
[in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
translation.ko: 자는 동안 할래? 깨어있는 동안 할래?

translation.en: I'm not the bad guy here.
You're the one sleeping with my husband.
We can do this painlessly if you want.
translation.ko: 원하면 고통 없이 해줄 수 있어

translation.en: Now go with the lovely nurse.
For helping me win the online competition
and the pictures at the launch.
I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.ko: 그레이스와 돈을 매일 안 봐도 되잖아

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.ko: 우리 어렸을 때의 그 무서운 사람이 전혀 아니었어

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 모든 게 우리 손에 파괴되는 걸 봐야 해

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.ko: 우리 아말레 잃은 지 6개월밖에 안 됐어

translation.en: I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.ko: 시간 필요 없어, 이건 끝내야 해

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
I did, but you don't need it.
translation.ko: 응, 그러긴 했는데 그거 필요 없을 거야

translation.en: [in English] Just in case things go wrong.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
translation.ko: 그 사람이랑 결혼하면 넌 세 번째 부인이 돼

translation.en: [in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
[in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 그 사람이 딴 여자들과 안 잔단 뜻은 아니지

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.ko: 덫에 걸린 기분이 들 거야 왠지 알아?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.ko: '벵구'란 이름에 이혼이란 얼룩은 용납 안 되니까

translation.en: if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.ko: 그레이스 사모님 계셔? 왔다고 인사드리고 싶은데

translation.en: [in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.ko: 저녁 같이 먹자 안 그러면 음식 다 버려야 해

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
translation.ko: 레지나가 모두 올 줄 알고 있어

translation.en: Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
translation.ko: - 왜 그리 됐는지 물어봐도… - 아빠는 어떠셔?

translation.en: [Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.ko: 사실 몇 개는 인쇄해서 액자에 넣을까 생각 중이야

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
translation.ko: 필라의 모든 걸 따라 하던 시절이었지

translation.en: They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.ko: 절개해야 했지 회복에 두 달 걸렸어

translation.en: I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.ko: 삶을 의미 있게 살지도 못하고 죽을 뻔했다고 말이야

translation.en: Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.ko: 지금은 삶에서 더 의미 깊은 걸 찾으려 하고 있지

translation.en: Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.ko: 나 떠나 돈, 난 더는 못 하겠어

translation.en: Repulsive? You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.ko: 그리고 난 계약보다는 큰 걸 누릴 자격 있어

translation.en: I want to marry you, start a family.
translation.ko: 난 너랑 결혼해서 가정을 꾸리고 싶은데?

translation.en: I'm sorry I have to go,
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.ko: 심장발작 이겨낸 사람인데 질식하면 안 되지

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
[in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
[in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
[in Sotho] The styles I arranged… you've switched them up, huh?
I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.ko: 셀카 찍어서 손토한테 보내 SNS에 올리게

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
[in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter…
[Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.ko: 엄마, 그런 말 하면 안 돼요

translation.en: [in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.ko: 쟤가 뽑혔을 때 난 요만큼은 결과가 맘에 안 들었어

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model,
but she is beautiful and she is likable.
[in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 레지나, 칼 이리 줘 내가 보여줄게

translation.en: [in English] You can let go, Nana.
